FOOD_EXPENSE: Food reimbursement is permitted for employees in Levels 2, 3, and 4 only. Orders must be placed post 7:00 PM, and the total expense must not exceed ₹3,000.
TRAVEL_EXPENSE: Cab travel expenses up to ₹1,000 are eligible for reimbursement, provided either the pick-up or drop-off location is within 1 km of the office premises.
TECH_EXPENSE: Reimbursement for tech-related purchases is limited to laptop accessories, including mouse, headphones/earphones, mouse pad, keyboard, desktop microphone, and webcam. The total claim must not exceed ₹5,000. Any requests for items outside this list require prior managerial approval.
